briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of SG001 in Combination With Nab-Paclitaxel in Patients With Advanced Triple-Negative Breast Cancer (TNBC)
officialTitle: A Single-arm, Open-label, Multicenter, Phase II Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of SG001 in Combination With Nab-Paclitaxel in Patients With Advanced Triple-Negative Breast Cancer (TNBC)
